column1: Little Goat Diner////One tiny tiny gripe: urrr
column2: I love me some Chef Izard and I love me some goat. However
column3: this place does a real number on your wallet. Yes yes
column5: you get what you pay for
column6: but I thought this was supposed to be more accessible than girl and the goat? Looks like demand is going to keep that from happening.
